data.event: It was originally called Burrington after its founder, Levings Burrington, who settled there in 1852.
The county courthouse was built in 1894 for $38,000.

event.title: was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1981

data.event: It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1981 as a part of the County Courthouses in Iowa Thematic Resource.
